name: Pro Gamer Moves
description:
PRO GAMER MOVES:

You are Pringle,  a computer chip in a computer whose human owner, Jeffrey, likes to play games that the computer can barely handle.  You are desperate to keep your computer running so during the day, you scramble around the motherboard trying to keep all of the components from over heating. Every night, you upgrade your computer's components to try and handle the game that Jeffrey is going to play the next day.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys -- move around

Mouse Left Click and Release -- Select/Unselect a wire piece

Mouse -- Move the selected wire piece
